amendment.description: Amendment gives priority for State Innovation Completion grants to entities that promote activities to increase degree or certificate completion for students who are veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 111-256 to give priority for State Innovation Completion grants to entities that promote activities to increase degree or certificate completion for students who are veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Adler (NJ) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Adler (NJ).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Adler (NJ) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
